Text:
Thnx for this, and many other uploads.  I am only downloading this to make my friends suffer 1.5 hours of extremely bad acting and plot as I once did.

With friends like me, who needs enemies?

This is by far the dumbest mind numbing movie of all time, and as stated above, I'm only going to waste the bytes and bandwidth to share the pain with others.

In good Karma I will seed this for 72 hours.
